title: Return & Refund Management Guide
author: Ekobol Support Team
image_caption: Streamline returns and refunds with automated workflows.
intro: Efficiently manage product returns and refunds with Ekobol's automated return management system. Configure policies, automate approvals, and keep customers satisfied.
p1: A clear return policy builds customer trust and reduces purchase hesitation. Ekobol helps you create, automate, and manage return workflows that balance customer satisfaction with business protection.
li1_text: Faster processing - automatic approval for eligible returns
li2_text: Reduced manual work - no need to review each return individually
li3_text: Customer satisfaction - instant return labels and status updates
li4_text: Fraud prevention - automatic flagging of suspicious return patterns
li5_text: Inventory management - automatic restocking or disposal routing
p2: Define your return rules once, and Ekobol applies them automatically to all eligible orders.
li6_text: Go to Settings → Return Management → Policies
li8_text: Set return window (e.g., 30 days from delivery)
li9_text: Define eligible reasons (defective, wrong item, changed mind, etc.)
li11_text: Choose refund method (original payment, store credit, exchange)
opt_window_desc: Days customer has to initiate return
p3: Here's what happens when a customer initiates a return:
li13_text: Customer logs into account and navigates to Orders
li16_text: Uploads photos if required (for damaged items)
li17_text: System checks eligibility against your policy
li18_text: If approved: Return label generated instantly
li19_text: If requires review: You receive notification for manual approval
p4: Customers can track return status in real-time through their dashboard.
p5: Configure rules to automatically approve or deny returns based on criteria.
li20_text: Reason-based: Auto-approve 'Wrong Item Received' but require review for 'Changed Mind'
li21_text: Value-based: Auto-approve orders under $50, require review for higher values
li22_text: Customer history: Auto-approve for customers with 0 previous returns
li23_text: Time-based: Auto-approve within 14 days, require review after
p6: Returns flagged for review appear in your Return Queue:
li27_text: Approve, deny, or request more information
li28_text: Add internal notes for team reference
p7: Ekobol integrates with major shipping carriers to generate return labels automatically.
li29_text: Carrier selection: Use customer's preferred carrier or your default
li30_text: Automatic weight calculation from product data
li31_text: Tracking number assigned and emailed to customer
li32_text: Label cost: Deducted from refund or charged separately
li33_text: QR code option: Customers can get label printed at carrier location
p8: Choose label payment method based on return reason:
li34_text: Your error (wrong item, defective): You pay for shipping
li35_text: Customer's choice (changed mind): Customer pays for shipping
li36_text: Configure in Settings → Return Management → Shipping Costs
p9: When a returned item arrives at your warehouse, follow this workflow:
li37_text: Scan return tracking number in Returns Dashboard
li39_text: Select action: Restock, Repair, or Dispose
li40_text: System updates inventory automatically if restocking
li41_text: Refund is processed (if not already issued)
p10: For high-value items or suspected fraud, enable detailed inspection:
li45_text: Restocking fee adjustments based on condition
li46_text: Partial refunds for items not meeting return policy
p11: Ekobol supports multiple refund methods to suit different scenarios.
p12: Store credit refunds encourage repeat purchases and have no processing fees.
p14: Exchanges are simpler than refunds - customer keeps shopping with you.
li53_text: If price differs: Charges extra or refunds difference
li54_text: New order created automatically, linked to return
li55_text: Shipping: Free if your error, customer pays if preference
p15: Protect your business from return abuse with built-in fraud detection.
li56_text: High return rate: Customer returns >30% of purchases
li57_text: Serial returner: Same item returned multiple times
li58_text: Wardrobing: Item shows usage (tags removed, worn, etc.)
li59_text: Empty box: Return tracking shows significantly lower weight
li60_text: Late returns: Return initiated after policy window
li62_text: Customer account notes for team visibility
li63_text: Ban from returns after 3 fraudulent attempts
p17: Track return metrics to identify product issues and optimize policies.
li65_text: Return rate: Percentage of orders returned
li66_text: Top return reasons: Identify quality issues
li67_text: Return window usage: Most returns in first 7 days?
li68_text: Restocking success rate: How many items can be resold?
li70_text: Product quality: High return rate = quality issue
li71_text: Product descriptions: 'Not as described' returns = update copy/photos
li72_text: Sizing guides: Size-related returns = add better sizing info
li73_text: Packaging: Damage in transit = upgrade packaging
help_text: Need help with a specific return scenario? Contact our support team.
